name: Mr. Beanos
desc: By snapping whit his glove on and whit all infinity stones in, his teddy bear will gain power unknown to mankind. Rumors say his teddy bear destroyed tens of planets luckly Mr. Beanos doesn't have the intention of being evil. The reason he attacked those planets was becouse they stole his teddy berry while he was trying to get rid of his fear of diving.
